summary: GODRIC'S HOLLOW: THE PLACE WHERE MAGIC WAS BORN
title: GODRIC'S HOLLOW: THE PLACE WHERE MAGIC WAS BORN
body:
GODRIC’S HOLLOW: THE PLACE WHERE MAGIC WAS BORN

MY VISIT TO GODRIC’S HOLLOW

“He was about to go home, about to return to the place where he had had a family. It was in Godric’s Hollow that, but for Voldemort, he would have grown up and spent every school holiday. He could have invited friends to his house… . He might even have had brothers and sisters… . It would have been his mother who had made his seventeenth birthday cake. The life…

View On WordPress

summary: ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student...
caption:
ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG

Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student could ever be on the grounds without feeling its presence. Students who have graduated from magical secondary schools all over the world choose Roanoke to continue their magical education. There are majors for those of all walks of life and every student who graduates will be prepared to join the magical world knowing they have the proper education.

In the year 2018, when tensions are high in the no-maj world the tensions are just as high on the magical side. There is a rise of young witches and wizards who are done living in the shadows. There is equal push-back from those who fear the repercussions of revealing themselves to no-majs. Rappaport’s Law is in place for a reason. American wizards and witches have been shown time and time again how no-majs couldn’t be trusted. They had been killing and persecuting wizards and witches for centuries. How will a campus filled with students from all over the world deal with each side of the debate?

MAIN || CHARACTER || RULES || APPLY

summary:
“…Bize aslında kim olduğumuzu gösteren şey, yeteneklerinizden çok seçimlerimizdir, Harry.”

 “Dursley'ler o yaz öylesine...
caption:
“…Bize aslında kim olduğumuzu gösteren şey, yeteneklerinizden çok seçimlerimizdir, Harry.”

“Dursley'ler o yaz öylesine çekilmez olmuşlardır ki, Harry bir an önce okulu Hogwarts'a geri dönmek için can atmaktadır. Eşyalarını toplarken ortaya çıkan ev cini Dobby ise onu uyarır: Hogwarts'a dönerse, bir felaket olacaktır. Olur da: Sırlar Odası'nın açılmasıyla ortaya çıkan karanlık bir güç, Hogwarts'takileri taşa çevirmeye başlar. Harry, hayatını tehlikeye atarak, Oda'nın elli yıllık ölümcül gizemini çözmeye çalışır. Ve gerçekten de başına gelmedik felaket kalmaz.”

Herkes izlemiştir Harry Potter'ı ama kitabını okumak çok farklı bir duygu, film size karakterlerin o an ne hissettiğini vermez o hissi, heyecanı ama kitaplar farklı o yüzden Harry Potter bir çocuk kitabı olsa da bu seriyi hep okuyacağım 70 yaşımda bile ve herkese tavsiye ederim çok farklı bir his veriyor

summary: It had been a long day but were glad you had your girlfriend, Luna. She just had a way of making you feel better and making...
caption:
It had been a long day but were glad you had your girlfriend, Luna. She just had a way of making you feel better and making everything okay even if it wasn’t. She was weird but sweet and had the ability to always make you smile.

“You could always help me find my shoes tomorrow?” She offered when you said you refused to go to Snape’s class in the morning as there had been an incident with the Slytherin’s once again.

You laughed, “I might just take you up on that.”

Requested By Anonymous

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: firenze: good luck, harry potter. the planets have been read wrongly before now, even by centaurs. i hope this is one of those...
body:
firenze: good luck, harry potter. the planets have been read wrongly before now, even by centaurs. i hope this is one of those times.

harry:

[Image: a photograph of John Mulaney, a white man in a black suit holding a microphone with an exasperated expression. The text reads ‘That’s what I thought you’d say, you dumb fucking horse.’]

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary: ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student...
caption:
ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG

Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student could ever be on the grounds without feeling its presence. Students who have graduated from magical secondary schools all over the world choose Roanoke to continue their magical education. There are majors for those of all walks of life and every student who graduates will be prepared to join the magical world knowing they have the proper education.

In the year 2018, when tensions are high in the no-maj world the tensions are just as high on the magical side. There is a rise of young witches and wizards who are done living in the shadows. There is equal push-back from those who fear the repercussions of revealing themselves to no-majs. Rappaport’s Law is in place for a reason. American wizards and witches have been shown time and time again how no-majs couldn’t be trusted. They had been killing and persecuting wizards and witches for centuries. How will a campus filled with students from all over the world deal with each side of the debate?

title: The Proposal
body:
by pottermum

summary:
Molly: Remus, do you think you and Tonks could cast a silencing charm next time?
Tonks: I wasn't with Remus last night......
body:
Molly: Remus, do you think you and Tonks could cast a silencing charm next time?

Tonks: I wasn’t with Remus last night…

Remus:…

Sirius: Molly, are you implying that I moan like a girl?

summary:
Prof. Potter: Five points will be taken from Slytherin, Mister Malfoy
Scorpius: My father will hear about this
Prof. Potter:...
body:
Prof. Potter: Five points will be taken from Slytherin, Mister Malfoy
Scorpius: My father will hear about this
Prof. Potter: I'll meet him in my office. We'll have dinner together. I can cook his favourite meal or maybe we could go to that fancy restaurant in London. What do you think he'd like better?

summary: ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student...
caption:
ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG

Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student could ever be on the grounds without feeling its presence. Students who have graduated from magical secondary schools all over the world choose Roanoke to continue their magical education. There are majors for those of all walks of life and every student who graduates will be prepared to join the magical world knowing they have the proper education.

In the year 2018, when tensions are high in the no-maj world the tensions are just as high on the magical side. There is a rise of young witches and wizards who are done living in the shadows. There is equal push-back from those who fear the repercussions of revealing themselves to no-majs. Rappaport’s Law is in place for a reason. American wizards and witches have been shown time and time again how no-majs couldn’t be trusted. They had been killing and persecuting wizards and witches for centuries. How will a campus filled with students from all over the world deal with each side of the debate?

MAIN || CHARACTER || RULES || APPLY
